content.description: ||Wait, you can see this too? This isn't right...||

fields.name: ||Notes||
fields.value: ||A hidden stage unlocked by killing the 14 minute boss on **Moongolow** with a non secret character. After obtaining the **Yellow Sign**, this stage is permanently inaccessible.||

fields.name: ||Yellow Sign||
fields.value: ||After going all the way through the corridor the player will get **Yellow Sign**, if the player did not reach it within 5 minutes, the stage will close.||

content.title: Holy Forbidden
